entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow this morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
